name: Asylum - 9 (Nine) Limited Edition - April Fool’s Day
additionalNotes: Founded nine years ago, the Asylum brand has made a name for itself by crafting memorable premium cigars in the big ring-gauge category. The Asylum Nine Limited Edition commemorates the brand’s ninth anniversary with a series of flavorful Honduran puros. It is the third anniversary stick Asylum has released. Each stick in this limited edition series is lain in a collectible wooden coffin to protect its delicate wrapper and preserve its awesome flavor. The Asylum Nine Limited Edition is handmade at the CLE Cigar Company in Honduras.
